---
title: "Abigail Balint - Flex Dashboard Example 604"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    orientation: columns
    vertical_layout: fill
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```



```{r}
data <- read.csv("695omnibus.csv")
data <- data[-c(2, 3, 4), ]
data <- data %>%
  filter(
    balint_stress != "How often do you experience stress related to personal finances?",
    balint_stress != "")

```



Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(x = balint_stress)) +
  geom_bar(fill = "purple") +
  labs(
    title = "Stress Levels Related to Personal Finance",
    x = "Stress Level",
    y = "Count",
    caption = "Source: DACSS 695 Omnibus Survey 2024"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(x = dinsmore_mh)) +
  geom_bar(fill = "purple") +
  labs(
    title = "Overall Mental Health Rating",
    x = "Mental Health",
    y = "Count",
    caption = "Source: DACSS 695 Omnibus Survey 2024"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```

### Chart C

```{r}

ggplot(data, aes(x = gomez_dinsmore_ad_1)) +
  geom_bar(fill = "purple") +
  labs(
    title = "Agree or Disagree - Handle Stress Well",
    x = "Handle Stress Well",
    y = "Count",
    caption = "Source: DACSS 695 Omnibus Survey 2024"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```
